CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Poolechester Dynasty?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Poolechester Dynasty is arc {South Stars}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc South Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc South Stars is arc {Poolechester Dynasty}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Rovers} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Poolechester Dynasty to South Stars in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Poolechester Dynasty to East Rovers in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and South Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and South Stars is {772}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between South Stars and East Rovers in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between South Stars and East Rovers is {892}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from South Stars?
SC.A: The total flow output from South Stars is {1765}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by East Rovers?
SC.A: The total flow input by East Rovers is {1465}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 942? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {993} from {South Stars} to {East Rovers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 520? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {472} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {East Rovers}, a flow of {318} from {East Rovers} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 395 and 832? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {772} from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {569} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {South Stars}, a flow of {472} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {East Rovers}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty or from South Stars to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Poolechester Dynasty to South Stars, from South Stars to East Rovers, or from East Rovers to South Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {East Rovers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Rovers} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc East Rovers, Arc South Stars, Arc Poolechester Dynasty}.
